27  package org.apache.http.impl.client.cache;
28  
29  import java.io.IOException;
30  import java.util.Date;
31  import java.util.HashMap;
32  import java.util.Map;
33  
34  import org.apache.http.Header;
35  import org.apache.http.HttpEntityEnclosingRequest;
36  import org.apache.http.HttpHost;
37  import org.apache.http.HttpRequest;
38  import org.apache.http.HttpResponse;
39  import org.apache.http.HttpStatus;
40  import org.apache.http.HttpVersion;
41  import org.apache.http.ProtocolVersion;
42  import org.apache.http.client.cache.HttpCacheEntry;
43  import org.apache.http.client.cache.HttpCacheStorage;
44  import static org.apache.http.impl.cookie.DateUtils.formatDate;
45  
46  import org.apache.http.message.BasicHeader;
47  import org.apache.http.message.BasicHttpEntityEnclosingRequest;
48  import org.apache.http.message.BasicHttpRequest;
49  import org.apache.http.message.BasicHttpResponse;
50  
51  import static org.easymock.classextension.EasyMock.*;
52  import org.junit.Before;
53  import org.junit.Test;
54  
55  public class TestCacheInvalidator {
56  
57      private static final ProtocolVersion HTTP_1_1 = new ProtocolVersion("HTTP", 1, 1);
58  
59      private CacheInvalidator impl;
60      private HttpCacheStorage mockStorage;
61      private HttpHost host;
62      private CacheKeyGenerator cacheKeyGenerator;
63      private HttpCacheEntry mockEntry;
64      private HttpRequest request;
65      private HttpResponse response;
66  
67      private Date now;
68      private Date tenSecondsAgo;
69  
70      @Before
71      public void setUp() {
72          now = new Date();
73          tenSecondsAgo = new Date(now.getTime() - 10 * 1000L);
74  
75          host = new HttpHost("foo.example.com");
76          mockStorage = createNiceMock(HttpCacheStorage.class);
77          cacheKeyGenerator = new CacheKeyGenerator();
78          mockEntry = createNiceMock(HttpCacheEntry.class);
79          request = HttpTestUtils.makeDefaultRequest();
80          response = HttpTestUtils.make200Response();
81  
82          impl = new CacheInvalidator(cacheKeyGenerator, mockStorage);
83      }
84  
85      private void replayMocks() {
86          replay(mockStorage);
87          replay(mockEntry);
88      }
89  
90      private void verifyMocks() {
91          verify(mockStorage);
92          verify(mockEntry);
93      }
94  
95      // Tests
96      @Test
97      public void testInvalidatesRequestsThatArentGETorHEAD() throws Exception {
98          request = new BasicHttpRequest("POST","/path", HTTP_1_1);
99          final String theUri = "http://foo.example.com:80/path";
100         Map<String,String> variantMap = new HashMap<String,String>();
101         cacheEntryHasVariantMap(variantMap);
102 
103         cacheReturnsEntryForUri(theUri);
104         entryIsRemoved(theUri);
105         replayMocks();
106 
107         impl.flushInvalidatedCacheEntries(host, request);
108 
109         verifyMocks();
110     }
111 
112     @Test
113     public void testInvalidatesUrisInContentLocationHeadersOnPUTs() throws Exception {
114         HttpEntityEnclosingRequest request = new BasicHttpEntityEnclosingRequest("PUT","/",HTTP_1_1);
115         request.setEntity(HttpTestUtils.makeBody(128));
116         request.setHeader("Content-Length","128");
117 
118         String contentLocation = "http://foo.example.com/content";
119         request.setHeader("Content-Location", contentLocation);
120 
121         final String theUri = "http://foo.example.com:80/";
122         cacheEntryHasVariantMap(new HashMap<String,String>());
123 
124         cacheReturnsEntryForUri(theUri);
125         entryIsRemoved(theUri);
126         entryIsRemoved("http://foo.example.com:80/content");
127 
128         replayMocks();
129 
130         impl.flushInvalidatedCacheEntries(host, request);
131 
132         verifyMocks();
133     }
134 
135     @Test
136     public void testInvalidatesUrisInLocationHeadersOnPUTs() throws Exception {
137         HttpEntityEnclosingRequest request = new BasicHttpEntityEnclosingRequest("PUT","/",HTTP_1_1);
138         request.setEntity(HttpTestUtils.makeBody(128));
139         request.setHeader("Content-Length","128");
140 
141         String contentLocation = "http://foo.example.com/content";
142         request.setHeader("Location",contentLocation);
143 
144         final String theUri = "http://foo.example.com:80/";
145         cacheEntryHasVariantMap(new HashMap<String,String>());
146 
147         cacheReturnsEntryForUri(theUri);
148         entryIsRemoved(theUri);
149         entryIsRemoved(cacheKeyGenerator.canonicalizeUri(contentLocation));
150 
151         replayMocks();
152 
153         impl.flushInvalidatedCacheEntries(host, request);
154 
155         verifyMocks();
156     }
157 
158     @Test
159     public void testInvalidatesRelativeUrisInContentLocationHeadersOnPUTs() throws Exception {
160         HttpEntityEnclosingRequest request = new BasicHttpEntityEnclosingRequest("PUT","/",HTTP_1_1);
161         request.setEntity(HttpTestUtils.makeBody(128));
162         request.setHeader("Content-Length","128");
163 
164         String relativePath = "/content";
165         request.setHeader("Content-Location",relativePath);
166 
167         final String theUri = "http://foo.example.com:80/";
168         cacheEntryHasVariantMap(new HashMap<String,String>());
169 
170         cacheReturnsEntryForUri(theUri);
171         entryIsRemoved(theUri);
172         entryIsRemoved("http://foo.example.com:80/content");
173 
174         replayMocks();
175 
176         impl.flushInvalidatedCacheEntries(host, request);
177 
178         verifyMocks();
179     }

181     @Test
182     public void testDoesNotInvalidateUrisInContentLocationHeadersOnPUTsToDifferentHosts() throws Exception {
183         HttpEntityEnclosingRequest request = new BasicHttpEntityEnclosingRequest("PUT","/",HTTP_1_1);
184         request.setEntity(HttpTestUtils.makeBody(128));
185         request.setHeader("Content-Length","128");
186 
187         String contentLocation = "http://bar.example.com/content";
188         request.setHeader("Content-Location",contentLocation);
189 
190         final String theUri = "http://foo.example.com:80/";
191         cacheEntryHasVariantMap(new HashMap<String,String>());
192 
193         cacheReturnsEntryForUri(theUri);
194         entryIsRemoved(theUri);
195 
196         replayMocks();
197 
198         impl.flushInvalidatedCacheEntries(host, request);
199 
200         verifyMocks();
201     }

203     @Test
204     public void testDoesNotInvalidateGETRequest() throws Exception {
205         request = new BasicHttpRequest("GET","/",HTTP_1_1);
206         replayMocks();
207         impl.flushInvalidatedCacheEntries(host, request);
208         verifyMocks();
209     }

216         verifyMocks();
217     }

219     @Test
220     public void testDoesNotInvalidateRequestsWithClientCacheControlHeaders() throws Exception {
221         request = new BasicHttpRequest("GET","/",HTTP_1_1);
222         request.setHeader("Cache-Control","no-cache");
223         replayMocks();
224         impl.flushInvalidatedCacheEntries(host, request);
225         verifyMocks();
226     }

228     @Test
229     public void testDoesNotInvalidateRequestsWithClientPragmaHeaders() throws Exception {
230         request = new BasicHttpRequest("GET","/",HTTP_1_1);
231         request.setHeader("Pragma","no-cache");
232         replayMocks();
233         impl.flushInvalidatedCacheEntries(host, request);
234         verifyMocks();
235     }
236 
237     @Test
238     public void testVariantURIsAreFlushedAlso() throws Exception {
239         request = new BasicHttpRequest("POST","/",HTTP_1_1);
240         final String theUri = "http://foo.example.com:80/";
241         final String variantUri = "theVariantURI";
242 
243         Map<String,String> mapOfURIs = new HashMap<String,String>();
244         mapOfURIs.put(variantUri,variantUri);
245 
246         cacheReturnsEntryForUri(theUri);
247         cacheEntryHasVariantMap(mapOfURIs);
248 
249         entryIsRemoved(variantUri);
250         entryIsRemoved(theUri);
251 
252         replayMocks();
253         impl.flushInvalidatedCacheEntries(host, request);
254         verifyMocks();
255     }
256 
257     @Test
258     public void testCacheFlushException() throws Exception {
259         request = new BasicHttpRequest("POST","/",HTTP_1_1);
260         String theURI = "http://foo.example.com:80/";
261 
262         cacheReturnsExceptionForUri(theURI);
263 
264         replayMocks();
265         impl.flushInvalidatedCacheEntries(host, request);
266         verifyMocks();
267     }
268 
269     @Test
270     public void doesNotFlushForResponsesWithoutContentLocation()
271             throws Exception {
272         replayMocks();
273         impl.flushInvalidatedCacheEntries(host, request, response);
274         verifyMocks();
275     }
276 
277     @Test
278     public void flushesEntryIfFresherAndSpecifiedByContentLocation()
279             throws Exception {
280         response.setHeader("ETag","\"new-etag\"");
281         response.setHeader("Date", formatDate(now));
282         String theURI = "http://foo.example.com:80/bar";
283         response.setHeader("Content-Location", theURI);
284 
285         HttpCacheEntry entry = HttpTestUtils.makeCacheEntry(new Header[] {
286            new BasicHeader("Date", formatDate(tenSecondsAgo)),
287            new BasicHeader("ETag", "\"old-etag\"")
288         });
289 
290         expect(mockStorage.getEntry(theURI)).andReturn(entry).anyTimes();
291         mockStorage.removeEntry(theURI);
292 
293         replayMocks();
294         impl.flushInvalidatedCacheEntries(host, request, response);
295         verifyMocks();
296     }
297 
298     @Test
299     public void doesNotFlushEntryForUnsuccessfulResponse()
300             throws Exception {
301         response = new BasicHttpResponse(HttpVersion.HTTP_1_1, HttpStatus.SC_BAD_REQUEST, "Bad Request");
302         response.setHeader("ETag","\"new-etag\"");
303         response.setHeader("Date", formatDate(now));
304         String theURI = "http://foo.example.com:80/bar";
305         response.setHeader("Content-Location", theURI);
306 
307         HttpCacheEntry entry = HttpTestUtils.makeCacheEntry(new Header[] {
308            new BasicHeader("Date", formatDate(tenSecondsAgo)),
309            new BasicHeader("ETag", "\"old-etag\"")
310         });
311 
312         expect(mockStorage.getEntry(theURI)).andReturn(entry).anyTimes();
313 
314         replayMocks();
315         impl.flushInvalidatedCacheEntries(host, request, response);
316         verifyMocks();
317     }
318 
319     @Test
320     public void flushesEntryIfFresherAndSpecifiedByNonCanonicalContentLocation()
321             throws Exception {
322         response.setHeader("ETag","\"new-etag\"");
323         response.setHeader("Date", formatDate(now));
324         String cacheKey = "http://foo.example.com:80/bar";
325         response.setHeader("Content-Location", "http://foo.example.com/bar");
326 
327         HttpCacheEntry entry = HttpTestUtils.makeCacheEntry(new Header[] {
328            new BasicHeader("Date", formatDate(tenSecondsAgo)),
329            new BasicHeader("ETag", "\"old-etag\"")
330         });
331 
332         expect(mockStorage.getEntry(cacheKey)).andReturn(entry).anyTimes();
333         mockStorage.removeEntry(cacheKey);
334 
335         replayMocks();
336         impl.flushInvalidatedCacheEntries(host, request, response);
337         verifyMocks();
338     }

361     @Test
362     public void doesNotFlushEntryIfContentLocationFromDifferentHost()
363             throws Exception {
364         response.setHeader("ETag","\"new-etag\"");
365         response.setHeader("Date", formatDate(now));
366         String cacheKey = "http://baz.example.com:80/bar";
367         response.setHeader("Content-Location", cacheKey);
368 
369         HttpCacheEntry entry = HttpTestUtils.makeCacheEntry(new Header[] {
370            new BasicHeader("Date", formatDate(tenSecondsAgo)),
371            new BasicHeader("ETag", "\"old-etag\"")
372         });
373 
374         expect(mockStorage.getEntry(cacheKey)).andReturn(entry).anyTimes();
375 
376         replayMocks();
377         impl.flushInvalidatedCacheEntries(host, request, response);
378         verifyMocks();
379     }

423     @Test
424     public void doesNotFlushEntryIfNotInCache()
425             throws Exception {
426         response.setHeader("ETag","\"new-etag\"");
427         response.setHeader("Date", formatDate(now));
428         String theURI = "http://foo.example.com:80/bar";
429         response.setHeader("Content-Location", theURI);
430 
431         expect(mockStorage.getEntry(theURI)).andReturn(null).anyTimes();
432 
433         replayMocks();
434         impl.flushInvalidatedCacheEntries(host, request, response);
435         verifyMocks();
436     }

438     @Test
439     public void doesNotFlushEntrySpecifiedByContentLocationIfResponseHasNoEtag()
440             throws Exception {
441         response.removeHeaders("ETag");
442         response.setHeader("Date", formatDate(now));
443         String theURI = "http://foo.example.com:80/bar";
444         response.setHeader("Content-Location", theURI);
445 
446         HttpCacheEntry entry = HttpTestUtils.makeCacheEntry(new Header[] {

449         });
450 
451         expect(mockStorage.getEntry(theURI)).andReturn(entry).anyTimes();
452 
453         replayMocks();

477     @Test
478     public void flushesEntrySpecifiedByContentLocationIfResponseHasNoDate()
479             throws Exception {
480         response.setHeader("ETag", "\"new-etag\"");
481         response.removeHeaders("Date");
482         String theURI = "http://foo.example.com:80/bar";
483         response.setHeader("Content-Location", theURI);
484 
485         HttpCacheEntry entry = HttpTestUtils.makeCacheEntry(new Header[] {
486                 new BasicHeader("ETag", "\"old-etag\""),
487                 new BasicHeader("Date", formatDate(tenSecondsAgo)),
488         });
489 
490         expect(mockStorage.getEntry(theURI)).andReturn(entry).anyTimes();
491         mockStorage.removeEntry(theURI);
492 
493         replayMocks();
494         impl.flushInvalidatedCacheEntries(host, request, response);
495         verifyMocks();
496     }

518     @Test
519     public void flushesEntrySpecifiedByContentLocationIfResponseHasMalformedDate()
520             throws Exception {
521         response.setHeader("ETag","\"new-etag\"");
522         response.setHeader("Date", "blarg");
523         String theURI = "http://foo.example.com:80/bar";
524         response.setHeader("Content-Location", theURI);
525 
526         HttpCacheEntry entry = HttpTestUtils.makeCacheEntry(new Header[] {
527                 new BasicHeader("ETag", "\"old-etag\""),
528                 new BasicHeader("Date", formatDate(tenSecondsAgo))
529         });
530 
531         expect(mockStorage.getEntry(theURI)).andReturn(entry).anyTimes();
532         mockStorage.removeEntry(theURI);
533 
534         replayMocks();
535         impl.flushInvalidatedCacheEntries(host, request, response);
536         verifyMocks();
537     }
538 
539     @Test
540     public void flushesEntrySpecifiedByContentLocationIfEntryHasMalformedDate()
541             throws Exception {
542         response.setHeader("ETag","\"new-etag\"");
543         response.setHeader("Date", formatDate(now));
544         String theURI = "http://foo.example.com:80/bar";
545         response.setHeader("Content-Location", theURI);
546 
547         HttpCacheEntry entry = HttpTestUtils.makeCacheEntry(new Header[] {
548                 new BasicHeader("ETag", "\"old-etag\""),
549                 new BasicHeader("Date", "foo")
550         });
551 
552         expect(mockStorage.getEntry(theURI)).andReturn(entry).anyTimes();
553         mockStorage.removeEntry(theURI);
554 
555         replayMocks();
556         impl.flushInvalidatedCacheEntries(host, request, response);
557         verifyMocks();
558     }
559 
560 
561     // Expectations
562     private void cacheEntryHasVariantMap(Map<String,String> variantMap) {
563         expect(mockEntry.getVariantMap()).andReturn(variantMap);
564     }
565 
566     private void cacheReturnsEntryForUri(String theUri) throws IOException {
567         expect(mockStorage.getEntry(theUri)).andReturn(mockEntry);
568     }
569 
570     private void cacheReturnsExceptionForUri(String theUri) throws IOException {
571         expect(mockStorage.getEntry(theUri)).andThrow(
572                 new IOException("TOTAL FAIL"));
573     }
574 
575     private void entryIsRemoved(String theUri) throws IOException {
576         mockStorage.removeEntry(theUri);
577     }
578
